title: Funny Angela Haircut
description: Funny Angela Haircut is a simulation game where you play as a hairdresser. Give Angela the best hairstyle ever! Enjoy tons of professional tools like curling irons, blow dryers, scissors, magic hair-growing spray, and so much more! Dye her hair in a variety of colors. Complete the makeover with a stylish outfit. Mix and match cute clothes and dress up Angela to become more fashionable!
